## Tarea 6-5

2 regiones: Buenos Aires y Patagonia

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
here::here("data/usu_individual_T423.rds")
```

Cargar datos

```{r}
my_data <- readRDS("/cloud/project/data/usu_individual_T423.rds")
```

```{r}
my_data<-my_data %>% select(REGION, ITF)
```

```{r}
my_data %>% 
  group_by(REGION) %>% 
  summarize(
    Media= mean (ITF)
    )
```

Nombrar regiones

```{r}
BuenosAires <- my_data %>% filter (REGION == "1")
Patagonia <- my_data %>%  filter (REGION == "44")
```

Test

```{r}
var.test(BuenosAires$ITF, Patagonia$ITF)
```

```{r}
my_data %>% 
  mutate(region=nombrar_regiones(REGION)) %>% 
  mutate(ingreso = ITF) %>%
  filter(ingreso>0) %>%
  group_by(region) %>%
  filter(region == "BuenosAires")%>% 
  filter(region == "Patagonia") %>% 
  summarize(
    Media = mean(ingreso),
    Mediana = median(ingreso),
    Desviacion = sd(ingreso),
    Desvio = mad(ingreso)
  )
```
